question: The goal of integrated marketing communications is to ________.

answers.text: have all marketing and promotional activities project a consistent unified image

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: That’s not correct. Pricing is not part of integrated marketing communications.

answers.text: gain control of the distribution process

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: That’s not correct. Paid methods of promotion are only a small part of the total promotional mix method that encompasses integrated marketing communications. IMC seeks to use a variety of promotional methods to reach the consumer.

answers.text: use only paid methods of promotion

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: That’s not correct. The distribution process is not part of integrated marketing communications.
Integrated marketing communications seeks to have all of the promotions send a consistent and unified image to the customer.

detailedSolution: Integrated marketing communications seeks to have all of the promotions send a consistent and unified image to the customer.
